title: VuVatech Launches a Non-Surgical Magnetic Dilator Device to Alleviate Pelvic Pain in Women
content:
SOURCE VuVatech LLC

SARASOTA, Fla. 

VuVatech's unique patent-pending approach to bringing relief to sufferers of these conditions uses holistic magnet therapy in combination with a set of vaginal dilators that graduate in size. VuVa Magnetic Dilators™ fills a void in the women's wellness market because it is nonsurgical and doesn't involve drugs, which historically have been the common ways doctors have treated these conditions. 

Clinical trials are in progress currently at Physician's Clinical Care Research in Sarasota. FL. 

Dr. Lennox Hoyte 

About VuVatech, LLC 

VuVatech is committed to bringing a non-surgical approach to millions of women suffering from the conditions of Vaginismus and Vulvodynia. VuVa Dilators are made in the USA
